channel.title: tinyproxy on Keep Improving

item.title: Tinyproxy轻量代理使用教程
item.description: Tinyproxy是一个轻量级的HTTP / HTTPS代理守护进程，快速且小巧。 Tinyproxy的安装 基于Docker安装 使用monokal/tinyproxy的镜像,dockerhub上的使用已经很清楚了，按照描述: docker run -d --name='tinyproxy' -p <Host_Port>:8888 --env BASIC_AUTH_USER=<username> --env BASIC_AUTH_PASSWORD=<password> --env TIMEOUT=<timeout> monokal/tinyproxy:latest <ACL> Set <Host_Port> to the port you wish the proxy to be accessible from. Set to ‘ANY’ to allow unrestricted proxy access, or one or more space seperated IP/CIDR addresses for tighter security. Basic auth is optional. Timeout is optional.
